DOC.brief_title: Optimization Preoperative Treatment Locally Advanced Rectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective phase III randomize multicenter trial . The purpose study compare short-term radiotherapy neoadjuvant chemotherapy ( Experimental group ) preoperative long-term chemoradiotherapy ( Control group ) middle-lower locally advanced rectal cancer . The primary endpoint 3-year disease-free survival , secondary objective 3-year local recurrence-free survival , distant metastasis-free survival overall survival . Furthermore , late toxicity profile quality life ( QoL ) 3 year follow-up secondary endpoint . The STELLAR-trial design Cancer Hospital , Chinese Academy Medical Sciences , hypothesis 3-year disease-free survival Experimental group non-inferior Control group .
